messages.message: Invalid colorModel in basic DFD block for *_422_* VkFormat.
messages.details: DFD block #1 colorModel in basic DFD block is KHR_DF_MODEL_RGBSDA but for VkFormat VK_FORMAT_G16B16G16R16_422_UNORM it must be KHR_DF_MODEL_YUVSDA.

messages.message: Unsupported multiple-sample format. Every sample position must be zero.
messages.details: DFD block #1 indicates multiple sample locations but multisample formats are not supported.
